information.message-alert:
The maximum amount of tax free cash you can take is 25% of the Lifetime Allowance is £1.25 million of the tax year 2014/15.

That means the most you can take tax free is £312,500.Your results will be based on a lump sum of this amount.

This value is likely to change if you are planning to retire after 2015.
